name: Escape the Louvre
description:
Developed by Victor Jimenez Granados and Benjamin Henning

"Escape the Louvre" is a 3d, first person stealth game featuring ominous lighting, suspenseful music, and a lot of sneaking around. You, the player, are tasked with sneaking your way through the warehouse/basement of the famous art museum, the Louvre. On each level you must find a key to open a door and move on to the next level. Watch out for security though! If you get caught by the patrolling guards, you have to start over the level.
